The head of Great Britain's Olympic cycling programme has signed a letter calling for a rule change that would stop transgender rider Emily Bridges racing in women's events.

articles.title: Chelsea sale: What the Ricketts Family have done immediately after London takeover talks - Football.London
articles.description: The Ricketts family are one of four bidders still in the running to buy Chelsea from Roman Abramovich
articles.content: With less than a week until final bids for Chelsea must be submitted, the Ricketts family were once again in London this week for further talks regarding their bid - but they did not hang around for … [+2169 chars]

articles.title: "Max Verstappen brought a knife to gunfight with Ferrari", says pundit Tom Coronel - PlanetF1

articles.content:
